Package com.satori.rtm

Provides high-level SDK API and the state machine to manage a connection state.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Callback<V>
    A callback for accepting the responses of the RTM Service
    RtmClient
    The RtmClient interface is the main entry point for accessing the RTM Service, including publish and subscribe operations.
    RtmClientListener
    Listener interface to define application functionality based on client state changes.
    SubscriptionListener
    Listener interface to define application functionality based on subscription state changes.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    RtmClientAdapter
    An empty implementation of RtmClientListener interface.
    RtmClientBuilder
    Use the RtmClientBuilder to create an instance of the RtmClient interface and set both the client properties and the listener for client state events.
    SubscriptionAdapter
    An empty implementation of the SubscriptionListener interface.
    SubscriptionConfig
    Defines the initial settings for a channel subscription.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Ack
    Sets up the acknowledgement mode for an operation.
    SubscriptionMode  

Package com.satori.rtm Description

Provides high-level SDK API and the state machine to manage a connection state.
